quote_last: that night a fireball rips through Obscurity, killing Cripps but not before he's called Goldilocks and left a message about something being 'full of holes.'
quote_raw: At 10:37 p.m. that night a fireball rips through Obscurity, killing Cripps but not before he's called Goldilocks and left a message about something being 'full of holes.'
title: The Fourth Bear
author: Jasper Fforde
